My Portfolio

About

Hello, I am a passionate amature animator who loves doing animations for short films, fan-made film and video games. I dabble in both 3D animation and 2D animation. I mainly focuse on animated films since my knowledge for videogames development is still limited. I have 2 years of experince in animation I am good with both form of animation 2D and 3D, though 2d is my speciality. I my artstyle differs from medium, for 2D its rubberhose style desgin or disney style. While my 3D is style is more simple bright colors and less organic shapes since my 3d sculping skills are not well developed yet. My 3d artstyle looks like those minecraft trailer. I use adobe animate for my 2D works and blender for my 3D works.
